1.0.name: wordpress/instagram-image-gallery
1.0.description:
This advanced widget lets you beautifully showcase Instagram photos on your blog or website.

  • For your own photos or a #hashtag feed
  • Thumbnails or slideshow
  • Wide range of custom options: background and text colors, photo borders, widget width, slideshow pace and much more.
